snippet.title: Vane - TGS Teaser 2014
snippet.description:
A recurring dream a thousand years old.
A land shut off from the world by walls of sand.
A glimmering power enslaving the ones within. 

Vane is an open-world adventure game based on mystery and exploration currently in development by Friend & Foe for the PC and every other platform we can get our hands on. This is an early teaser of gameplay footage from TGS 2014. 

www.friendandfoegames.com
@FriendAndFoeDev
